pr_title: [CI] Cancel outdated jobs when new builds are fired

timeline.message:
[CI] Cancel outdated jobs when new builds are fired

And also exclude paths that don't need to trigger plugin tests

[CI] Cancel outdated jobs when new builds are fired

And also exclude paths that don't need to trigger plugin tests

timeline.bodyText: Could you share what cancel tests could do now? And add those add comments here?
timeline.author: wu-sheng

+name: Cancel
+
+on:
+  workflow_run:
+    workflows:
+      - CI AND IT
+      - E2E
+      - PluginsTest
+    types:
+      - requested
+
+jobs:
+  cancel-outdated-builds:

replies.bodyText:
Compared to #5556 (comment) , now the improvement is

this is helpful whenever the cancel-outdated-builds job get a slot to run, it cancels ALL outdated builds, no matter which PR it is running for. For example, if PR 1 has 2 jobs in queue, where 1 jobs are outdated, and PR 2 has 100 jobs in queue, where 99 jobs are outdated, when PR1 triggers a cancel-outdated-builds to run, it will cancel outdated jobs in both PR1 and PR2, leaving only 2 latest jobs to run for PR1 and PR2 respectively.
replies.author: kezhenxu94

replies.bodyText: OK, it will scan all outdates jobs in all PRs. Then it only requires one slot, then the blocking queue could be clear as much as possible.
replies.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText:
Could you add some comments about this?

              cancel-outdated-builds:
          
          
            
              # Cancel outdated builds in the repo, including all action tasks of all commits.
          
          
            
              cancel-outdated-builds:
replies.author: wu-sheng
